div.h4: FOOD SAFETY, STORAGE AND REHEAT INSTRUCTIONS Posted Date: 04/06/2020
div.p:
STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS:
Cool Food Rapidly:
Cool food rapidly by the time above so it reaches as fast as possible the safe refrigerator-storage temperature of 40° F or below.

div.h4: A note from our counselor Posted Date: 12/18/2018
div.p: The majority of my job fits within the role of a school counselor as it is described in ASCA. I would estimate that I spend 75% of my day guiding students in academic, career, and personal . . .

div.h4: Welcome to Wilson Public Schools Posted Date: 09/20/2019

div.p: Due to state mandated precautions for COVID-19, Wilson Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. We are currently in the planning process in developing our distance learning strategy. We will keep you updated and informed as soon as possible.

The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19. These provisions will apply from April 1, 2020 through December 31, 2020.

p.small: It is the policy of Wilson Public School District No. I-43 not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs, services, and activities as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, and the Age Discrimination Act of 1975. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies: Superintendent, 1860 Hewitt Road, Wilson, OK 73463, telephone number (580) 668-2306.
